code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,AppBar,Toolbar,Typography,Button,Box,Alert,Card,CardContent,Grid,CircularProgress,useTheme,useMediaQuery}from'@mui/material';import{AuthContext}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import TovarForm from'./TovarForm';import TovarItem from'./TovarItem';import API_BASE_URL from'../config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Tovars=()=>{const theme=useTheme();const isMobile=useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down('sm'));const{isAuthenticated,token,loading,logout}=useContext(AuthContext);const[tovars,setTovars]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[messageType,setMessageType]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{if(!loading){if(!isAuthenticated){navigate('/login');}else{loadTovars();}}},[isAuthenticated,loading]);const loadTovars=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tovars`,{headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to load tovars');}const data=await response.json();if(data.success){setTovars(data.data);}else{setMessage(data.message);setMessageType('error');}}catch(error){setMessage(error.message||'Error loading tovars');setMessageType('error');}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};const handleAddTovar=async(title,description,image,genre,releaseDate,rating)=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tovars`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`},body:JSON.stringify({title,description,image,genre,releaseDate,rating})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to add tovar');}const data=await response.json();if(data.success&&data.data){setTovars([...tovars,data.data]);setMessage('Tovar added successfully');setMessageType('success');}else{setMessage(data.message||'Error adding tovar');setMessageType('error');}}catch(error){setMessage(error.message||'Error adding tovar');setMessageType('error');}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};const handleUpdateTovar=async(id,title,description,image,genre,releaseDate,rating)=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tovars/${id}`,{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`},body:JSON.stringify({title,description,image,genre,releaseDate,rating})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to update tovar');}const data=await response.json();if(data.success){setTovars(tovars.map(tovar=>tovar._id===id?{...tovar,title,description,image,genre,releaseDate,rating}:tovar));setMessage('Tovar updated successfully');setMessageType('success');}else{setMessage(data.message||'Error updating tovar');setMessageType('error');}}catch(error){setMessage(error.message||'Error updating tovar');setMessageType('error');}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};const handleDeleteTovar=async id=>{if(!window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this tovar?'))return;setIsLoading(true);try{const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tovars/${id}`,{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to delete tovar');}const data=await response.json();if(data.success){setTovars(tovars.filter(tovar=>tovar._id!==id));setMessage('Tovar deleted successfully');setMessageType('success');}else{setMessage(data.message||'Error deleting tovar');setMessageType('error');}}catch(error){setMessage(error.message||'Error deleting tovar');setMessageType('error');}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",color:"primary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",component:"div",sx:{flexGrow:1},children:"Movie ",localStorage.getItem('username')]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:messageType==='error'?'error':'success',sx:{mb:2},children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TovarForm,{onAddTovar:handleAddTovar,isLoading:isLoading})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Tovars"}),isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',py:4},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{size:40})}):tovars.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",align:"center",children:"No tovars found"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:2},children:tovars.map(tovar=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TovarItem,{tovar:tovar,onUpdateTovar:handleUpdateTovar,onDeleteTovar:handleDeleteTovar,isLoading:isLoading},tovar._id))})]})]})]})})})]});};export default Tovars;
